meanings.definition: The sport of walking fast over a set distance within specified rules.
meanings.sent1: Racewalking is a type of sport where people walk quickly following specific rules.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching racewalking competitions during the Olympics.
meanings.sent3: When I tried racewalking, I almost fell over because I was walking too fast!
meanings.sent4: In the world of racewalking, every step is like a carefully choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of racewalking makes it a unique and challenging sport to master.

meanings.definition: To participate in a racewalk competition.
meanings.sent1: I will racewalk in the upcoming track meet to test my speed.
meanings.sent2: She trained hard to racewalk in the local competition.
meanings.sent3: My friends were surprised when I told them I wanted to racewalk instead of run.
meanings.sent4: He racewalked through the finish line with determination and focus.
meanings.sent5: The athletes racewalking around the track looked graceful and determined.

meanings.definition: A racewalk event in a track and field competition.
meanings.sent1: The racewalking event at the track meet was intense and exciting.
meanings.sent2: I cheered loudly for my friend competing in the racewalking race.
meanings.sent3: During the racewalking event, the crowd was amazed by the speed of the athletes.
meanings.sent4: The racewalking competition showcased the incredible stamina of the participants.
meanings.sent5: The racewalking event was the highlight of the track and field competition.
